description: Removed beat-3 bass drum in main riff and chorus to get better syncopation; otherwise a great drum track!
title: Bombtrack

description: Bass part changes only. There was a mistake in the very first verse (not d-b-g but rather d-e-g). The chorus was missing the chromatic descending riff sometimes. Verse and Chorus was notated oddly and was hard to read. I didn't change it but made it easier to read by using appropriate sixteenth notes and ties. The original transcriber has two C#'s on the hold (1...2....3...!) but I can't hear that. I left it in though. A lot of vibratos but I've never seen him do a vibrato. It sounds like a slight bend (in the verse) instead (on the 5th fret A).
title: Bombtrack

description: Cleaned up rhythm guitar section, corrected solo, made some corrections to all guitar parts, minor corrections for drums and bass during the Bridge.
title: Bombtrack
